text:
ExecVision | Multiple positions | Arlington | Full Time | Remote

ExecVision is focused on phone conversation analysis and AI assisted sales coaching. We just closed a post-seed round, and are expanding our team. Our stack is Kotlin / Python / Postgres / Elasticsearch / Tensorflow, on AWS.

Senior Software Engineer - https://www.execvision.io/img/positions/Software-Engineer-Pr...

Machine Learning Engineer - https://www.execvision.io/img/positions/AnalyticsMachine-Lea...

To apply, please email your resume to tech-careers@execvision.io.
